title: Pro Bike Check: Lewis Buchanan’s 2022 Norco Range High Virtual Pivot Enduro Bike
content:
After the launch of the highly anticipated 2022 Norco Range, we caught up with Pro Enduro Racer, Lewis Buchanan, to get up close and personal with the new High Virtual Pivot Suspension layout. Lewis isn’t on the Norco Factory team, so it was cool to see an alternative setup with suspension from DVO, brakes from […]

The post Pro Bike Check: Lewis Buchanan’s 2022 Norco Range High Virtual Pivot Enduro Bike appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
